title: Chinese Chicken Salad
ingredients: 3 ½  boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and diced
1 head lettuce, torn into small pieces
6 ounces Chinese noodles, heated briefly to crisp
method: Step 1: Prepare salad: Combine chicken, lettuce, green onion, celery, noodles, nuts, and sesame seeds in a large salad bowl. Mix all together. Set aside.
Step 2: Make dressing: Put vinegar in a small bowl. Dissolve sugar and salt in vinegar before adding oil. Shake, or beat, well.
Step 3: Add dressing to salad, toss to coat, and serve.
